amendment.description: To amend the rule of construction.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 1319 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 51 - 49. Record Vote Number: 51.
Amendment SA 1319 proposed by Senator Cramer for Senator Sullivan. (consideration: CR S1036; text: CR S1036) To amend the rule of construction.
